11.メインストーリー『遥かなる故郷へのおはなし』クリア: Cleared Main Story "To a Faraway Hometown"

18.メインストーリー『嵐穿つ断罪の虚空のおはなし』クリア: Cleared Main Story "Through the Empty Storm"

22.メインストーリー『目覚めし五つの種族のおはなし』クリア: Cleared Main Story "Awakening of the Five Tribes"

25.メインストーリー『赤き大地の双王子のおはなし』クリア: Cleared Main Story "Two Princes of Red Earth"

28.メインストーリー『紡がれし勇気の絆のおはなし』クリア: Cleared Main Story "Bonds of Courage Spun"

47.連れている仲間モンスターの転生回数3回以上＆レベル45以上: Have a Monster with 3+ Reincarnations and Level 45+

52.転生回数3回以上＆レベル45以上の仲間モンスターがいる: Have a Monster with 3+ Reincarnations and Level 45+

87.クエスト『はるかなる釣り道「その者 釣り老師」』クリア: Cleared Quest "Faraway Fishing Path 'The Master of Fishing'"

101.『英雄はすべてを救う』『明日へのコーダ』『魔物たちの挽歌』クリア: Cleared "A Hero Saves All", "Coda's Tomorrow", "Monster's Elegy"

123.住宅村に 自分の家を 建てることができます。|空いてる土地は 立て札を調べること: You can build your own house in the residential village. You can buy|vacant land by looking up the sign. To build a house, you will need a|"House Kit" sold at the building shop. Build a house of your choice by|arranging "Decor" and "Garden Decor"!

125.フィールドにいるモンスターを討伐するクエストです。|１日１回 一部の町にいる討伐: This is a quest to defeat monsters in the field. Once per day, You can|receive a request from a member of the Strike Force in some towns.|Recommended for adventurers who want to earn experience and gold.

126.フィールドにいるモンスターを討伐するクエストです。|１週間に１回 グランゼドーラ: This is a quest to defeat monsters out in the field.|Once per week, you can receive a request from|the Strike Force member in Gran Zedora. These|requests grant a lot of experience points.

127.クエスト『あの人に追いつきたくて』クリア: Cleared Quest "I Want to Catch Up with Him"

129.ナドラガンドの各領界にいるモンスターを討伐していくクエストです。|たくさんの経験: This is a quest to defeat monsters in each territory of Nadragand. You|will get a lot of experience and gold. In addition, you will receive a|completion reward by completing all the requests in one realm.

130.バージョン４のフィールドにいるモンスターを討伐するクエストです。|たくさんの経験: This is a quest to defeat monsters in the field in version 4. You can|get a lot of experience and gold. In addition, you can receive a|completion reward by completing all the requests of one era.

131.仲間モンスターと協力して挑戦するクエストです。|４人の冒険者と ４匹の仲間モンス: This is a quest in which you and your fellow monsters cooperate to|fight a boss monster in a party alliance battle between four|adventurers and four fellow monsters. Make sure to train your fellow|monsters well before taking on the challenge.

133.強力なモンスターの能力をマネた ５人の演者たちを相手に|どこまで勝ち進めるか挑戦: In this content, players challenge five performers who mimic the|abilities of powerful monsters to see how far they can go. Even if you|are eliminated, you will receive rewards up to the end of the game, so|feel free to take on the challenge.

135.パーティ同盟バトルが待ち受ける 長編クエストです。|突如現れ ガケっぷち村を滅ぼ: A party alliance battle awaits you in this feature-length quest. You|will fight to protect the world from King Calamity who suddenly appears|in Ruined Village. When you challenge King Calamity at the end of the|story, the battle will be a party alliance battle with 8 players.

136.パーティ同盟バトルが待ち受ける 長編クエストです。|高名な占い師グランマーズの助: A party alliance battle awaits you in this feature-length quest. With|the help of the renowned fortune teller Madame Luca, you will pursue the|mystery of the deadly nightmares that assail you. At the end of the|story, when you challenge the incarnation of destruction and murder,|you will battle in a party alliance of eight players.

137.レンダーシアの各地に発生した 謎の「ヒズミ」を|とある同行者とともに調査していく: This is a full-length quest in which you and a certain companion|investigate the mysterious "Strain" that has occurred in various parts|of Lendersia. The storyline ends with a party alliance battle.

139.「アスフェルド学園」を舞台にした 長編クエストです。|学園で出会う仲間たちととも: This is a full-length quest set in Asfeld Academy. Save the school from|a crisis with your friends you meet at the school. There are many|elements unique to "Asfeld Academy".

141.神聖秘文字で書かれた 「万象流転の書」の解読に挑戦します。|サジェとリルチェラと: Challenge yourself to decipher the "Book of All Things", written in|Holy Secret writing. Join Sajay and Lilcherat for mini-games and photo|shoots as they unravel the changes that have taken place in Nadragand.

142.妖精図書館にある本へと入って進めていく 長編クエストです。|「記憶の本」の登場人: It's a long quest where you enter the books in the Fairy Library. You|will be a character in the "Memory Book" and go on an adventure. It|will test your deductive powers to solve mysteries and break through|difficulties.

144.謎解きを楽しむ長編クエストです。|絶海の孤島に建つ 「紅玉館」で起きる事件の真相: A long quest for those who enjoy solving mysteries. This is the story|of the mysterious "Ruby Mansion", which lies on an isolated island.|Your skills of deduction will be put to the test.

146.さまざまなミニゲームで遊ぶことができる施設です。|スロット・ポーカー・ルーレット: This facility allows you to play a variety of mini-games. You can get|"Casino Tokens" by playing games such as slots, poker, and roulette.|"Casino Tokens" can be exchanged for useful items for adventures and|fun items such as "Decor," "Garden Decor," and "Dol Radio".

148.スライムを育成して レースで競走させるコンテンツです。|期間限定の「アストルティ: This content lets you train slimes to compete in races. You can get|gorgeous rewards by challenging the Limited Time "Astoltia Cup".

149.ドルボードに乗って フィールド上を疾走するレースです。|スタート地点からゴール地: This is a race where you ride a Dolboard across a field. Players|compete for the best time from the starting point to the finish line.|You can practice for the "Dolboard Race Grand Prix" as many times as|you like.

151.「バトエン」を転がし ライバルたちと遊ぶコンテンツです。|３本の「バトエン」を組: In this content, players roll "Batoen" and play against rivals,|combining three "Batoen" to form a deck. The key to victory lies in the|order of the "Batoen" in the deck and the timing of the turnover. Feel|free to challenge yourself.

153.水辺に近づくと 魚を釣ることができます。|「おさかな交換員」で 釣った魚を「おさ: You can catch fish by approaching the water's edge. You can exchange|the fish you catch for "Fish Coins" at the "Fish Exchange". You can|also get a reward from the "Old Fish Master" in Lendor. You can also|put the fish you catch in the "Aquarium" in the house or the "Fish|Pond" in the garden.

155.種族ごとのクラブに属して 勝ち点を競い合う|みつどもえのバトルコンテンツです。|: In this three-way battle content, players compete for victory points by|belonging to clubs of their own race. Aim for victory, win bases, and|collect jewels. In the limited-time "Battle Trinity", unite and do your|best to win.

157.１枚の写真を手がかりに 隠されたお宝を探し出すコンテンツです。|パーティメンバー: This is a content that searches for hidden treasures using a single|photo as a clue. All party members can participate in the search, so it|is a good idea to go searching together.

159.世界のどこかに現れる 独特な姿をしたモンスターを探し出し|「モンスターシール」を: Find and collect "Monster Stickers" to find unique-looking monsters|that appear somewhere in the world. By collecting stickers, you can|learn about monster ecology and obtain items and monster statues.

164.エステラのお部屋を訪れて 彼女が大好きな「ぬいぐるみ」を|プレゼントしましょう。: Visit Estella's room and give her a "Plushie" she loves. She will|surely be pleased. The plushies you give her will be displayed on the|shelves. If you give her a lot of gifts, good things may happen...?

166.メレアーデのお部屋に 彼女が大好きなネコを 集めましょう。|メレアーデが ネコち: Gather the cats she loves in Mereade's room. Mereade will take care of|the cats. You may try to find your favorite one. If you collect a lot|of cats, something good may happen...?

167.ネコの「ついてクンカプセル」を 手に入れることができます。|ガニャポンに必要な: You can get "Pet Capsules" of cats. The "Cat Coins" needed for|"Ganyapon" can be exchanged for "Mini Medals" at the Ganyapon shop.|Some special packs appear by meeting the conditions...?

168.仲間モンスターだけのパーティで モンスター格闘場の|モンスターとバトルするコンテ: In this content, you battle monsters in the Monster Arena with a party|of only your fellow monsters. You can win various prizes including|fashionable equipment. Collect "badges" to further strengthen your|fellow monsters.

169.メインストーリーで戦ったボスモンスターと 再戦できます。|一部のボスモンスターに: You can rematch the boss monsters you fought in the main storyline.|Some boss monsters have "Very Hard" difficulty levels. It is a good way|to test your strength to see how much stronger you are than before.

171.町にいる「達人」から 毎週５つのクエストが提示されます。|その中からひとつ選んで: Five quests are presented each week by the "Master" in town. Choose one|of them, and by accomplishing it, you will be rewarded with a set|number of pearls. Let's challenge the one you think you can accomplish|from various conditions.

172.職人になると 装備品や家具を作ったり|さまざまな錬金効果をつけたりすることができ: As a craftsman, you can create equipment, decor and add various|alchemical effects. The items you create can be bought and sold at|facilities such as the "Traveler's Bazaar". First, practice and improve|your craftsmanship.

173.謎の遺跡島にある 正体不明のダンジョンを探索するコンテンツです。|探索で手に入る: This content involves exploring an unidentified dungeon on the Isle of|Ruins. You can get various kinds of armor by bringing back the "Abyss|Orbs" obtained in the exploration to the exit. Think about the order of|the rooms so that you can visit as many rooms as possible.

174.入るたびに構造が変わるダンジョンを探索し|最深部にいるボスを討伐するコンテンツで: In this content, players explore a dungeon whose structure changes each|time they enter it and defeat the boss at the deepest level. You can|get a "Lottery Ticket" once a day by clearing the dungeon, so it's a|good idea to keep playing.

176.魔法の迷宮で戦うことができる 特別なボスモンスターです。|「コイン」「メダル」「: These are special boss monsters that can be fought in the Magic Maze.|By offering "Coins", "Medals", "Boss Cards" and "summons", you can|fight the corresponding boss. If you succeed in defeating the bosses,|you can obtain powerful accessories. The low Lv bosses are more|suitable for beginners, so it is recommended to refer to them.

178.ピラミッドの霊廟に現れる モンスターの集団を撃退しましょう。|次々にモンスターが: Fight off the groups of monsters that appear in the Pyramid's Tomb.|Since the monsters appear one after another, it is important not only|to defeat them, but also to heal carefully and conserve MP. You can get|a reward from one Tomb only once a week.

180.勇者姫アンルシアや仲間モンスターと共に ダンジョンを探索し|最深部にいる ボスモ: Players explore a dungeon with Anlucia herself, and can bring along|their fellow monsters. The goal is to defeat the boss at the deepest|level. There's a strict time limit, so players must best decide how|to spend the precious time they have.

182.８人でのパーティ同盟で挑む バトルコンテンツです。|ボスモンスターの組み合わせや: This is a battle content in which players challenge in 8-person party|alliances. The combination of boss monsters and challenges changes each|time, so cooperation and ingenuity are required to win. The "Sky|Prison" which appears under certain conditions, offers even tougher|battles.

184.そびえたつ塔の中にひそむ モンスターを倒しながら|上の階を目指していくダンジョン: The dungeon is a towering dungeon where you aim for the upper floors|while defeating monsters hidden in the towers. You cannot bring in|items or gold that you have acquired during your adventures outside the|tower. You will start from level 1 with a special job, so train|yourself in the tower as you progress.

185.住宅の庭に 畑を設置すると|花や作物のタネをまいて 育てることができます。|日々: When you set up a field in the garden of a house, you can sow seeds of|flowers and crops and grow them. Take care of them every day to get|items such as flowers for dyeing and ingredients for cooking.

187.装備品や素材を 訪れた冒険者に販売するための家具です。|「収納家具」内のアイテム: This decor is used to sell equipment and materials to visiting|adventurers. You can select items in the "Storage" and set the sales|amount. It is fun to decorate your home and open your own store.

189.モンスターの軍団から 防衛拠点を守るバトルコンテンツです。|みんなで協力して 防: This is battle content to protect the defense base from a monster|corps. Let's cooperate with others to defend the defense wards. You can|exchange various weapons and shields at the "Reward Exchange Y" by|collecting "Defense Medals" and materials.

191.次々と迫りくるモンスターを倒していく スコアアタックバトルです。|たくさんのモン: This is a score attack battle where you have to defeat monsters that|come at you one after another. Aim for a high score by defeating many|monsters. If you are wiped out, the game will not be cleared and your|score will be zero, so it is an important strategy to carefully retreat|from the battle.

193.ナドラガンドに現れた 強敵たちに挑みます。|挑戦には「竜牙石」が必要となります。: You will challenge the powerful enemies who appeared in Nadragand. To|challenge them, you will need "Dragonite". Each monster has five levels|of health, and you can choose which level you want to challenge before|you fight. This is a great test of strength for adventurers who are|confident in their skills.

195.古代の羅刹たちの復活を阻止するため 強敵たちに挑みます。|挑戦には「破魔石」が必: The challenge is to prevent the resurrection of an ancient demon. The|challenge requires the "Demon Stone". These demons are among the|strongest in Astoltia. Even adventurers with confidence in their skills|will find it extremely difficult to defeat them.

196.４対４でプレイヤー同士がバトルする施設です。|「公式バトル」で ランキングの頂点: This is a facility where players battle each other in 4-on-4 matches.|Aim for the top of the ranking in the "Official Battle" or compete your|skills as a fighter. You can also win prizes in the Limited Time|"Battle Grand Prix".

197.目標として提示された能力値の達成を目指すコンテンツです。|達成することで スキル: This content is designed to achieve the ability values presented as|goals. By achieving the target, you will receive rewards such as Skill|Books. Make full use of the weapons and armor accessories you equip and|raise your level to reach the target values.

199.魔界では まれに「輝晶獣」という強力なモンスターが出現します。|この輝晶獣が持つ: In the Demon World, powerful monsters called "Pyrobeasts" appear on|rare occasions. Collecting the "Pyroclast" of the Pyrobeast will give|your weapon an additional effect called "Shine". You can also challenge|the Pyrobeasts by collecting "Magic Cells" obtained from monsters in|the Demon World.

201.期間限定で開催される 生き残りクイズバトルです。|制限時間内に正解と思う扉を選び: This is a Quiz Battle for survival held for a limited time. You choose|the door you think is the correct answer within the time limit and|proceed to the next room. The questions are all different depending on|the date and time of the event. Please challenge the "Wisdom Lord" who|is on the top floor of Fort Wisdom!

202.期間限定で開催される おたから集めコンテンツです。|幻の海トラシュカへ向かう航海: This is a limited time offer to collect treasure. Players will|participate in a voyage to Phantom Sea Trashka, and aim for a high|score by dodging obstacles and collecting the treasure that will be|launched. You can also check the ranking of your friends and teams.

203.期間限定で開催される 追いかけっこコンテンツです。|３人の追跡チームと ５人の逃: This is a limited time only catch and run content. The teams will be|divided into a 3-member Tracking Team and a 5-member Escapee Team. The|Tracking Team wins if they catch everyone within the time limit. The|Escapee Team wins if even one person escapes. Let's run around without|giving up until the end!

204.期間限定で開催される スライムたちとのかくれんぼです。|ステージに隠れているスラ: This is a hide-and-seek game with slimes held for a limited time.|Players compete for scores by finding as many slimes as possible hidden|in the stage. Cooperative play by a party is important to get a high|score. Aim for a high score and find slimes as fast as you can!

205.特殊なクイズバトルに 挑むことができるコンテンツです。|対戦相手のレモンハルトは: This content allows you to challenge special quiz battles. Your|opponent, Lemonheart, becomes a monster and uses the same "Skills" and|"Spells". Guess what kind of monster it is based on the information you|get during the battle and receive experience and rewards!

207.トランプの「大富豪」を 遊ぶことができます。|配られた手札を ルールにしたがって: You can play "Tycoon". The winner is the first player to play a hand of|cards according to the rules and the first player to run out of cards|in his or her hand. You can play with your friends or practice by|yourself. You can also try out the "Ranked" Daily Rules.

209.高額なゴールドが当たる ビッグでドリームな「くじ券」です。|駅の売店で購入するこ: It's a big and dreamy "Lottery Ticket" with a high gold prize. You can|buy them at the station kiosks. Even if you don't win, you will receive|a participation prize, so please buy one when sales start.

210.期間限定で開催される 釣りの大会です。|特定の場所で 専用の釣り道具を使うことで: This is a fishing competition held for a limited time only.|Participants compete in the size of seasonal fish that can be caught by|using special fishing equipment at specific locations. Participation|can be made from Fish Master Natsuri, who is located in South Port|Lendor. Let's fish hard for a great reward!

212.魔界のどこかにいる 幽霊作家バケンズから|毎週 ５つの依頼を受けることができます: You will receive five requests each week from Ghost Writer Bakenz|located somewhere in the Demon World. By accomplishing the requests,|you can obtain experience and items. There are a variety of requests|ranging from defeating monsters to taking care of the fields, so let's|check out what kind of requests there are first!

213.依頼者の心が生みだした ダンジョンを 勇者姫アンルシアや|仲間モンスターと共に探: In this content, explore the dungeon created by the requester's mind,|together with Hero Princess Anlucia and her fellow monsters, and aim|for the deepest level. Each time you clear a dungeon, the Maze level|increases and the enemies become stronger, but you can obtain more|experience, stamps, gold and a chance of receiving an Augite Belt!

215.アストルティアのどこかで起こるという 不思議な出来事を|写真機で撮影するクエスト: This is a quest to use the camera to capture a mysterious event that is|said to take place somewhere in Astoltia. First, let's hear from|Scholar Dokchul on the second floor of the Dolworm Crystal Palace.

216.期間限定で開催される 大富豪の大会です。|大会ごとに決められたルールで 記録を競: This is a time-limited Tycoon tournament. Compete for records with|rules determined for each tournament. Enjoy a different atmosphere with|a special background. You will receive luxurious rewards according to|your record.

217.期間限定で開催される 特別なモンスターバトルロードです。|８人の冒険者と パーテ: This is a special Monster Battle Road held for a limited time only.|Form a party alliance with eight other adventurers to challenge special|monsters. Enjoy unusual special battles with your prized fellow|monsters enhanced with "Badges" and other items!

219.コロシアム最強の闘士を決定する バトルイベントです。|頂点を目指して 戦闘のウデ: This is a battle event to determine the strongest fighter in the|Coliseum. Let's compete with each other for the top spot in the battle.|Participation in official battles will not be available during the|event. Special rewards will be prepared for the top ranking fighters!

221.あらゆる世界へ 侵略の手を伸ばそうとする 大魔王ゾーマ。|その魔の手が アストル: Great Demon King Zoma is trying to invade every corner of the world.|His evil hand is about to strike Astoltia. Gather your friends at|Luida's Bar and ride into Zoma's castle to challenge the Great Demon|King that awaits you! The reward, "Spirit's Sparkle," can be exchanged|for a variety of thank-you gifts.

222.クラブ同士の威信をかけた 期間限定の大会です。|勝ち点を稼いで 所属クラブを優勝: This is a limited-time tournament that pits clubs against each other|for prestige. Earn enough points to take your club to the championship|and bring home the trophy! Participants from the winning club will|receive gold prizes, as well as rewards based on their contributions|and club rankings.

223.「お祭りコイン」を使って挑戦できる 期間限定のお祭りです。|ポーカー スロット: This is a limited-time festival that can be challenged using "Festival|Coins". A special casino raid will be held when playing Poker, Slots,|Roulette and Bingo. The coins earned in one raid will be recorded and|the top ranks will be ranked, and you will receive rewards for|defeating raids based on the type of monsters you defeat.

226.錬金石 経験値 特訓スタンプ ゴールド など: Gems, EXP, Training Stamps, Gold, etc.

229.経験値 特訓スタンプ ゴールド スキルブック など: EXP, Training Stamps, Gold, Skill Books, etc.

232.特典プレゼントの『継続特典』を 受け取ることができます。|さらに すでに受け取っ: You can receive "Benefits" as a reward gift. In addition, some of the|"Benefits" that you have already received can be exchanged with Present|Tickets for other "Adventure Log" characters who have not received any|"Benefits".

234.身代わりのコイン 錬金石 ボスカード ボスコイン無料券 など: Substitution Coins, Gems, Boss Cards, Free Boss Coin Tickets, etc.

238.まりょくのたね お役立ち機能 おしゃれ装備 など: Seed of Sorcery, Useful Functions, Glamour, etc.

242.まりょくのたね ふしぎなきのみ など: Seed of Sorcery, Seed of Magic, etc.

244.いのちのきのみ 黄金の花びら など: Seed of Life, Golden Petals, etc.

247.ルーラストーン 家具庭具 おしゃれ装備 ドルボードプリズム など: Zoomstone, Furniture, Garden Furniture, Glamour, Dolboard Prisms, etc.

255.経験値の聖典 ボスコイン 黄金の花びら など: EXP Scrolls, Boss Coins, Golden Petals, etc.

257.ボスコイン 錬金石 ちいさなメダル など: Boss Coins, Gems, Mini Medals, etc.

259.ちいさなメダル 夢のアクセサリー箱２ 庭具 など: Mini Medals, Dream Accessory Box 2s, Garden Furniture, etc.

261.８人でのパーティ同盟で強敵に挑む バトルコンテンツです。|イベントは不定期に開催: This is a battle content in which 8-person party alliances take on|powerful enemies. Events are held irregularly and the boss monster|changes each time. Each boss monster is a formidable foe, so everyone|must work together to defeat them, making full use of the items|provided.

262.ルーラストーン おしゃれ装備 ベルト倉庫のカギ など: Zoomstone, Glamour, Belt Storage Key, etc.

264.スキルブック ふしぎなきのみ 傘装備: Skill Books, Seed of Magic, Umbrellas

269.おしゃれ装備 絆のエンブレム スカウトの書 など: Glamour, Bonding Emblems, Scout Books, etc.

271.スキルブック ちいさなメダル 黄金の花びら など: Skill Books, Mini Medals, Golden Petals, etc.

290.経験値の古文書 フィギュアチケット 黄金の花びら など: EXP Scrolls, Figure Tickets, Golden Petals, etc.

291.スキルブック ちからのたね など: Skill Books, Seeds of Strength, etc.

298.ついてクンカプセル 夢のアクセサリー箱 など: Pet Capsules, Dream Accessory Boxes, etc.

306.ドルボードプリズム おしゃれ装備 家具庭具 など: Dolboard Prisms, Glamour, Furniture, Garden Furniture, etc.

313.おしゃれ装備 バッジ交換券 ハッピーハート など: Glamour, Badge Tickets, Happy Hearts, etc.

315.錬金石 ボスコイン 黄金の花びら など: Gems, Boss Coins, Golden Petals, etc.

318.経験値の聖典 ふくびき券 ボスコイン おしゃれ装備 家具 など: EXP Scrolls, Lottery Tickets, Boss Coins, Glamour, Furniture, etc.

341.サジェとリルチェラの神聖秘文: Holy Secret of Sajay and Lilcherat

358.期間限定で開催される ２０人での協力型コンテンツです。|海底で故障した 潜水艇ガ: This is a 20-player cooperative content held for a limited time. Let's|collect parts to repair the submarine "Gateria" that broke down at the|bottom of the sea. If you can return safely from the seafloor after|retrieving many treasures, you will get a high score! Let's all help|each other to succeed in the undersea exploration!

368.バトエンポイント 錬金石 ボスコイン など: Batoen Points, Gems, Boss Coins, etc.

371.イルーシャの話をヒントに スケッチする場所を探し出しましょう。|描いてもらった絵: Use the hints from Irusha's story to find a place to sketch. You can|see the drawings in her sketchbook in her room.

373.ドラゴンクエストＸの 公式サイト『目覚めし冒険者の広場』にある|ＤＱＸショップで: This is a useful shop where you can exchange Shop Points for items sold|in the DQX Shop on the official Dragon Quest X website "Adventurer's|Square". You can find a wide variety of fashionable equipment and|useful items to help on your adventure, so please take advantage of it!

386.入るたびに 部屋の内容が変わるダンジョンを探索し|最深部にいるボスを 討伐するコ: In this content, players explore a dungeon whose rooms change each time|they enter, and defeat the boss at the deepest level. Players can|strengthen themselves by growing "Goddess Trees" using "Geneseeds"|given as rewards.

388.期間限定で開催される バトエンの大会です。|ピックとデッキの異なるルールで|前半: This is a limited time Batoen tournament. The record will be divided|into the first half and the second half with different rules for picks|and decks. You will receive gorgeous rewards according to your record.

394.深淵の咎人たちが地上に現れるのを阻止するため 強敵たちに挑みます。|４人もしくは: Challenge the strongest enemies to prevent the Abyss Criminals from|appearing on earth. Challenges can be taken by 4 or 8 players, with|different rewards for each. In 4-player battles, there are two levels|of monster health, which changes daily, but in 8-player battles, the|first level is fixed. We recommend an 8-player party alliance battle.

395.アストルティア世界を 征服しようとする 竜王。|魔法の迷宮にやってきた ローラ姫: The Dragonlord is trying to conquer the world of Astoltia. Receive a|"Rainbow Drop" from Princess Gwaelin, who has come to the Magic Maze,|and use it to get to the Dragonlord's castle to stop his schemes.

411.酒場や町の入口などにある掲示板のことです。|プレイヤーが応募した絵葉書を掲載する: Bulletin boards are located in bars, town entrances, etc. You can check|various information such as "Notification Square" where postcards|submitted by players are posted, "World Ranking" where you can see the|ranking of boss defeats and coliseum, "Find a Team" where you can search|for teams you want to join, "Today's Town Info" and so on.

420.これまでに戦ったボスたちと 再戦することができるコンテンツです。|ボスたちは シ: This content allows you to rematch the bosses you have fought in the|past. The bosses are more powerful than when they appeared in the|scenario. You can challenge the battle from the "Book of Bosses|Hard Mode Boss Chapter". Rewards can be obtained once a day.

421.これまでに戦った 試練の門の強敵たちと|再戦することができるコンテンツです。|「: This content allows you to rematch the powerful enemies from Trial|Gates that you have fought in the past. You can challenge them via the|"Book of Bosses Trial Gate Boss Chapter". Rewards can be obtained|once a week.

422.これまでに戦った 同盟バトルの強敵たちと |再戦することができるコンテンツです。: This content allows you to rematch the powerful enemies from Alliance|Battles you have fought in the past. You can challenge them via the|"Book of Bosses Alliance Battle Chapter". Rewards can be obtained|once a day.

424.港町レンドア北の モコモコハウスにいる|ロスターから お題を受けることができます: You can receive a task from Roster at Mokomoko House in the North Port|Lendor. Rewards will be given by Roster upon the theme's completion.|The theme is updated on the 1st and 15th of each month.

432.バルディスタ城の地下に用意された スコアアタックバトルです。|待ち受けるボスの攻: Score attack battle prepared in the basement of Valdista Castle. Aim|for a high score by dealing a lot of damage within the time limit while|avoiding the attacks of the waiting bosses. If you die during the|battle, you will fail the challenge, so it is important to attack while|calmly avoiding the boss's attacks.

437.ドルボードに乗って フィールド上を疾走するレースです。|スタート地点からゴール地: This is a race where you ride a Dolboard across a field. Players|compete for the best time from the starting point to the finish line.|You will be rewarded with a splendid prizes according to your time.
